ygData.subject: RE: thoughts on screaming mace?
ygData.msgSnippet: I use a Screaming Mace and it procs a lot at 16th level Dex 112.  I see it proc every fight and most fights it procs several times.  I ve even had it proc on
ygData.messageBody:
I use a Screaming Mace and it procs a lot at 16th level Dex 112. I see it
proc every fight and most fights it procs several times. I've even had it
proc on three sucessive attacks. I have spent entire fights yaulped for
over a minute. Not sure why you aren't seeing many procs, but could just be
some bad days of clumpy random number generation.

Kitasi screaming away happily on E'ci

-----Original Message-----
From: James Schuldes [mailto:jgs@...]
Sent: Thursday, September 02, 1999 7:51 AM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] thoughts on screaming mace?


From: James Schuldes <jgs@...>

Some procs are level capped - might be the case - has it ever proc'd for
you? I used one for a while but my skill was real low and I hand to
switchback to something I was more skilled in. But ill dig my mace out
again and build it up eventially.

Sylly.

-----Original Message-----
From: Jukeboxie the Bard [mailto:jukeboxie@...]
Sent: Wednesday, September 01, 1999 7:34 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] thoughts on screaming mace?

From: "Jukeboxie the Bard" <jukeboxie@...>

Am level 16, and just got my screaming mace. I plan to dual
wield it with my
dirk at 17 until/unless I get a tomohawk (I have about 100pp
in the bank and
am still saving up).

My 1H blunt is currently 76 (the cap at level 16 is 85); I
used a fine steel
warhammer for some levels to keep my blunt skill up, so I
should be able to
cap out pretty easily. My dex is currently 118, and the mace
doesn't seem to
proc much (but I didn't get it for the proc effect, anyway).
Quick review:

Screaming Mace:
1H Blunt
Damage: 8
Delay: 35
Weight: 8 (heavy!)
Effect: Screaming Mace (Yaulp)
Damage/Delay = 0.22857

Was previously using Dragoon Dirk:
Piercing
Damage: 6
Delay: 23
Weight: 2.5
Damage/Delay = 0.2609

(The dirk has obviously been relegated to the ranged weapon
slot, so I can
still get the +2 dex, +3 sv magic bonus.)

If nothing else, it'll be useful in fighting those pesky
fire-shielded mobs
in Lavastorm; I used to come out severely hurt from those
fights because my
dragoon dirk was so darn fast.

I'll definitely hang on to the screaming mace for a while,
to cap out my 1H
blunt skill, if nothing else. I was considering dual
wielding a tomohawk and
the mace at 17, since I tend to do most of my hunting solo
(Berserker
Strength + Yaulp). Jaxan's Jig is currently one of my
regularly memorized
songs anyway, so there haven't been any big changes to my
songlist from
swinging around that big ole heavy thing.

Thoughts?

-Juke
